channel.title: PI pvp points shop [rep ++]
channel.description:
I feel like a complete noob asking this.... Anyways. I want to change the item prices in my PvP points shop, i've checked in my shophandler.java shops.cfg anything to do with shops, and i can't manage to find where to change them at :3
shop id= 47
just looking for the right file to search in :D

item.title: PI pvp points shop [rep ++]
item.dc:creator: @Wet_Dreamss Wet Dreamss
item.description:
@Wet_Dreamss wrote:

[quote=“Kozs, post:2, topic:422247”]ShopAssisant.java it will say like

case (ITEM ID);
return (PKP):

Example

case 1;
return 100:[/quote]
sweet, i appreciate it bro

Read full topic
